trait.name: Use of Fire
trait.description: Enables hunters and wardens to apply fire-oil to their ranged weapons.

trait.name: Use of Light
trait.description: Enables hunters and wardens to apply light-oil to their ranged weapons.

trait.name: Runic Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Runes.

trait.name: Shield Spike Use
trait.description: Allows the use of shield-spikes

trait.name: Master
trait.description: Those that serve the Dark Lord of Mordor are beginning to seek conflict with you directly, lest you foil their schemes.

trait.name: Journeyman
trait.description: As a hardy warrior of Middle-earth, you have seen much conflict.

trait.name: Adept
trait.description: The road to saving Middle-earth is long, but you are already walking it.

trait.name: One-handed Axes
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Axes. Axes have a small chance of reducing the target's armour.

trait.name: One-handed Clubs
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Clubs. Clubs have a small chance of slowing the target's Attack Speed.

trait.name: One-handed Hammers
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Hammers. Hammers have a small chance of lowering the target's ability to Evade.

trait.name: One-handed Maces
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Maces. Maces have a small chance of slowing the target's movement speed.

trait.name: One-handed Swords
trait.description: Allows the use of One-handed Swords. Swords have a small Parry-chance increase.

trait.name: Daggers
trait.description: Allows the use of Daggers. Daggers have a small chance of landing Critical Hits.

trait.name: Dual Wielding
trait.description: Allows the wielding of a second weapon in the off-hand.

trait.name: Specialized Equipment
trait.description: Allows the use of Specialized Equipment and to learn how to play instruments.

trait.name: Light Armour
trait.description: Allows the use of Light Armour.

trait.name: Medium Armour
trait.description: Allows the use of Medium Armour.

trait.name: Horn Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Horns.

trait.name: Two-handed Axes
trait.description: Allows the use of Two-handed Axes. Axes have a small chance of reducing the target's armour.

trait.name: Two-handed Hammers
trait.description: Allows the use of Two-handed Hammers. Hammers have a small chance of lowering the target's ability to Evade.

trait.name: Two-handed Swords
trait.description: Allows the use of Two-handed Swords. Swords have a small Parry-chance increase.

trait.name: Spear
trait.description: Allows the use of Spears. Spears have a small chance of wounding the target, inflicting damage over time.

trait.name: Shields
trait.description: Allows the use of Shields. Shields slightly reduce the chance to be critically hit.

trait.name: Bows
trait.description: Allows the use of Bows. Bows have a small chance of landing Critical Hits when using auto-attack.

trait.name: Heavy Armour
trait.description: Allows the use of Heavy Armour.

trait.name: Two-handed Clubs
trait.description: Allows the use of Two-handed Clubs. Clubs have a small chance of slowing the target's Attack Speed.

trait.name: Halberd
trait.description: Allows the use of Halberds. Halberds increase threat level, drawing the attention of your enemies upon yourself.

trait.name: Summoning Horn Use
trait.description: Allows the use of summoning horns.

trait.name: Lute Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Lutes.

trait.name: Clarinet Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Clarinets.

trait.name: Flute Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Flutes.

trait.name: Harp Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Harps.

trait.name: Two-handed Staves
trait.description: Allows the use of Two-handed Staves.

trait.name: Crossbows
trait.description: Allows the use of Crossbows. Crossbows lower the chance of your auto-attacks being blocked by the target.

trait.name: Heavy Shields
trait.description: Allows the use of Heavy Shields. All heavy shields greatly reduce the chance to be critically hit and carry a small penalty to Evade.

trait.name: Improved Range
trait.description: Your skill with ranged weapons allows you to attack from a greater distance than others.

trait.name: Small Size
trait.description: Reduced Might - hobbits lack the physical strength of other races.

trait.name: Hobbit-toughness
trait.description: Improved Vitality - hobbits are remarkably tough.

trait.name: Rapid Recovery
trait.description: Improved Morale Regeneration out of combat - hobbits recover from trying times faster than other races.

trait.name: Hobbit-courage
trait.description: Improved Fear Resistance - the slow-kindled courage of the hobbit race.

trait.name: Resist Corruption
trait.description: Improved Shadow Mitigation - hobbits have a great resistance to temptation.

trait.name: Stoop for a Stone
trait.description: You gain a short-distance ranged attack.

trait.name: Guile and Conviction Bonus
trait.description: You receive a bonus to Spider's Guile and Eagle's Cry contributions

trait.name: Hobbit Club-damage Bonus
trait.description: Hobbit Club-damage Bonus

trait.name: Hobbit-stature
trait.description: You have overcome your humble beginnings and play a mighty role in this age. Your Might is improved.

trait.name: Return to Michel Delving
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Michel Delving.

trait.name: Return to Rivendell
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Rivendell.

trait.name: Hobbit-resilience
trait.description: You can raise your Fellowship's Hope value through good old-fashioned hobbit-cheer. This does not stack with other Hope buffs.

trait.name: Hobbit-stealth
trait.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

trait.name: Hobbit-silence
trait.description: You can lie prone in complete silence, causing enemies to ignore you.

trait.name: Gift of Men
trait.description: Improved Fate - Men have the greatest destiny of all the Free Peoples.

trait.name: Diminishing of Mankind
trait.description: Decreased Will - Men have weaker wills than the other races.

trait.name: Easily Inspired
trait.description: Increased Morale Restoration- Men are more quickly emboldened than the other races.

trait.name: Strong Men
trait.description: Improved Strength - The feats of strength that men such as Boromir could accomplish are worthy of song.

trait.name: Upper-cut
trait.description: You gain a short-distance melee attack.

trait.name: Tactics and Might Bonus
trait.description: You receive a bonus to Stallion's Spirit and Ent's Strength contributions.

trait.name: Man Sword-damage Bonus
trait.description: Man Sword-damage Bonus

trait.name: Man of the Fourth Age
trait.description: You are destined to greatness -- a Man for the Fourth Age -- but for now you must secure the Third. Your Will is improved.

trait.name: Return to Bree
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Bree.

trait.name: Duty-bound
trait.description: You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Morale.

trait.name: Balance of Man
trait.description: The Race of Man grows eerily proficient at the art of war.

trait.name: Strength of Morale
trait.description: In combat, the Race of Man is known for its unquenchable spirit.

trait.name: Sorrow of the Firstborn
trait.description: Reduced Morale and Morale Regeneration out of combat - Elves feel things more deeply than the other races and are more subject to sorrow.

trait.name: Agility of the Woods
trait.description: Improved Agility - The Grace of the Eldar is remembered in legend.

trait.name: Fading of the Firstborn
trait.description: Reduced Fate - The time of the Elves in Middle-earth is nearly at its end.

trait.name: Suffer no Illness
trait.description: Improved resistance to Disease and Poison - Elves do not suffer illness.

trait.name: Silvan Shadows
trait.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

trait.name: Tactics and Conviction Bonus
trait.description: You receive a bonus to Eagle's Cry and Stallion's Spirit contributions.

trait.name: Elf Bow-damage Bonus
trait.description: Elf Bow-damage Bonus

trait.name: Friend Of Man
trait.description: You are devoted to guiding the race of Man. Your Fate is improved.

trait.name: Eldar's Grace
trait.description: With the speed and grace of the Eldar, you can put up a strong parry defence.

trait.name: Elf One-handed Sword-damage Bonus
trait.description: Elf One-handed Sword-damage Bonus

trait.name: Power of the Eldar
trait.description: You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Power.

trait.name: Sturdiness
trait.description: Increased Might and Vitality, improved Common damage mitigation - dwarves are a sturdy race.

trait.name: Stocky
trait.description: Reduced Agility - dwarves are naturally less agile than the other races.

trait.name: Lost Dwarf-kingdoms
trait.description: Reduced Fate - the dwarves' time in Middle-earth is fading.

trait.name: Unwearying in Battle
trait.description: Bonus to Morale and Power regeneration in combat, penalty to Morale and Power regeneration out of combat.

trait.name: Head-butt
trait.description: You gain a short-distance melee attack.

trait.name: Guile and Might Bonus
trait.description: You receive a bonus to Spider's Guile and Ent's Strength contributions.

trait.name: Dwarf Axe-damage Bonus
trait.description: Dwarf Axe-damage Bonus

trait.name: Fateful Dwarf
trait.description: You are a dwarf of great influence. Your Fate is improved.

trait.name: Return to Thorin's Gate
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Thorin's Gate.

trait.name: Endurance of Stone
trait.description: For a short amount of time, you can withstand blows that would batter a weaker race's Morale into dust.

trait.name: Dwarf-endurance
trait.description: You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Vitality.

trait.name: Clever Devices
trait.description: Enables burglars to use devices such as caltrops and marbles.

trait.name: Tools of the Trade
trait.description: Enables burglars to use special tools to facilitate their clever tricks.

trait.name: Books of Lore
trait.description: Allows the use of books of lore.

trait.name: Hand Wrought Traps
trait.description: Allows hunters to use traps crafted by Weaponsmiths.

trait.name: Armament Use
trait.description: Allows the wielding of Armaments.

trait.name: Horns of Valour
trait.description: Allows the use of champion horns.

trait.name: Shield Brawler
trait.description: Your defensive combat abilities have been improved.

trait.name: Heroic
trait.description: The fates of the One Ring and the Free Peoples are being shaped by heroes such as yourself.

trait.name: Drum Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Drums.

trait.name: Theorbo Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Theorbo.

trait.name: Bow Chants
trait.description: Allows hunters to employ ancient chants to empower their bow to various different ends.

trait.name: Virtuous Man
trait.description: The Virtues of Men are represented strongly in you. This trait does not apply to unequipped or capped Virtues.

trait.name: Virtuous Dwarf
trait.description: The Virtues of the Dwarves are represented strongly in you. This trait does not apply to unequipped or capped Virtues.

trait.name: Virtuous Elf
trait.description: The Virtues of the Elves are represented strongly in you. This trait does not apply to unequipped or capped Virtues.

trait.name: Virtuous Hobbit
trait.description: The Virtues of the Hobbits are represented strongly in you. This trait does not apply to unequipped or capped Virtues.

trait.name: Tracking Guide
trait.description: Allows the Hunter to share the location of his tracked target with his fellowship members. Only information about non-player targets can be shared in this way.

trait.name: Bagpipe Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Bagpipes.

trait.name: Basic Cowbell Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Cowbells.

trait.description: Allows the use of Warden's Shields. Warden Shields reduce the chance to be critically hit.

trait.description: Wardens train primarily with spears and have learned to get the most out of them.

trait.description: Wardens have learned a few fancy sword manoeuvres.

trait.name: Club Training
trait.description: Wardens learn advanced club techniques when keeping order in civilized lands.

trait.description: Wardens have learned a few fancy sword manoeuvres.

trait.description: Wardens train primarily with spears and have learned to get the most out of them.

trait.description: Wardens train primarily with spears and have learned to get the most out of them.

trait.name: Expert Sword Training
trait.description: Wardens have learned a few fancy sword manoeuvres.

trait.name: Expert Club Training
trait.description: Wardens learn advanced club techniques when keeping order in civilized lands.

trait.name: Rune-stones
trait.description: Allows the use of Rune-stones. Rune-stones have affinity to fire, lightning, or frost.

trait.description: Grants Burglars greater effectiveness when wielding daggers.

trait.name: Daggers Training: Expert
trait.description: Grants Burglars greater effectiveness when wielding daggers.

trait.name: Daggers Training: Master
trait.description: Grants Burglars greater effectiveness when wielding daggers.

trait.description: Allows the use of Carvings.

trait.name: Critical Defence
trait.description: Reduces the chance for the Captain to suffer a critical hit.

trait.name: Improved Halberd Training
trait.description: Your skill with a Halberd has improved.

trait.name: Newbie
trait.description: You are young and eager to see all of Middle-earth.

trait.description: Using the skill Defensive Strike can apply the Potency effect to you.

trait.name: Improved Deft Strike
trait.description: Using the skill Deft Strike can apply the Potency effect to you.

trait.name: Improved Goad Strike
trait.description: Using the skill Goad can apply the Potency effect to you.

trait.name: Ancient Wisdom
trait.description: Your research into lost knowledge increases your Will.

trait.name: Pibgorn Use
trait.description: Allows the use of special Pibgorns.

trait.name: Audacity
trait.description: Audacity improves your ability to fight the Servants of Angmar.

trait.name: Sword and Staff
trait.description: You now may dual wield sword and staff.

trait.name: Footpad
trait.description: You are harder to detect while Stealthed.

trait.name: Back Stab
trait.description: Positional attacks deal more damage.

trait.name: Hidden Dagger
trait.description: Deal more damage from Stealth.

trait.name: Deft Strikes
trait.description: Increases Critical Chance.

trait.name: Aim
trait.description: Earns the skill: Aim.

trait.name: Playful Mind
trait.description: Increases the duration of your Tricks.

trait.name: Trick: Dust In the Eyes
trait.description: Earns Trick: Dust in the Eyes.

trait.name: Practical Joke
trait.description: Increases Trick and Trick Removal skill damage.

trait.name: Startling Twist
trait.description: Rank 1 earns the skill: Startling Twist.\n\nRank 2 allows Startling Twist to affect multiple enemies.

trait.name: Trickster
trait.description: Your next Trick is applied to multiple targets and can stack a normal Trick.

trait.name: Trick: Counter Defence
trait.description: Earns Trick: Counter-Defence.

trait.name: Perplexing Proposition
trait.description: Trick Removal skills can be used more often.

trait.name: Leaf Walker
trait.description: You are harder to detect while Stealthed.

trait.description: Boosts Evade chance.

trait.description: Increases chance of applying a Gamble.

trait.description: Increases the damage of damage-over-time effects.

trait.name: Trip
trait.description: Earns the skill: Trip.

trait.description: Increases damage for any skill that deals damage over time.

trait.name: Rain of Thorns

trait.description: Increases Trap damage and reduced Trap cooldowns.

trait.description: Earns the skill: Explosive Arrow.

trait.description: Increases Critical Chance.

trait.description: Earns the skill: Split Shot.\n\n Subsequent ranks increase number of targets.

trait.description: Lightning skills place a stack of Fury of Storm on the Rune-keeper, increasing the Critical Damage of their next attack.\n\nCritical hits will consume this effect.

trait.description: Increases the damage and daze duration of Shocking touch.

trait.description: Fire skills increase the fire damage of the Rune-keeper.\n\nThis effect can stack up to five times.

trait.name: Essence of Flame
trait.description: Single target attack that refreshes the current tier of Fiery Ridicule on a target.

trait.name: After-burn
trait.description: Increases fire damage-over-time.

trait.name: Thunderous Words
trait.description: Lightning skills have a chance to briefly buff lightning skill's Critical Chance.

trait.name: Ceaseless Argument
trait.description: Earns the skill: Ceaseless Argument.

trait.name: Conflagration of Runes
trait.description: Increases the damage of Fiery Ridicule.\n\nAt max rank, Fiery Ridicule affects up to three targets.

trait.name: Scathing Mockery
trait.description: Earns the skill: Scathing Mockery.

trait.name: Mending Verse
trait.description: Earns the skill: Mending Verse.

trait.name: Rune of Restoration
trait.description: Earns the skill: Rune of Restoration.

trait.name: Deadly Strikes
trait.description: Increases Critical damage for all Strike skills.

trait.name: Mighty Blast
trait.description: Increases Horn of Gondor damage.\n\nAt max rank, Horn of Gondor reduces Cry resistance.

trait.name: Ardent Rage
trait.description: Increases the Fervour generated by Battle Frenzy. \n\n Max rank lowers the cooldown of Battle Frenzy and replaces its Fervour regeneration effect with a more powerful version.

trait.name: Sweeping Riposte
trait.description: Grants the skill: Sweeping Riposte.

trait.name: Vicious Strikes
trait.description: Every hit on Strikes skills have an increased chance to critically hit.

trait.name: Athletic
trait.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sprint.\n\nAt max rank, Sprint will cause the Champion's next attack to briefly stun the target.

trait.name: Battle Frenzy
trait.description: Grants the skill: Battle Frenzy.

trait.name: Thrill of Battle
trait.description: Critical hits with response skills will heal you for a percentage of your max Morale. This heal can't trigger more than once every 20 seconds.

trait.description: Grants the skill: Second Wind.

trait.name: Brutal Charge
trait.description: Your Charge becomes Brutal Charge.

trait.name: Invigourating Parry
trait.description: Critical hits with your parry response skills will restore power.

trait.name: Appraising Eye
trait.description: The skill Reveal Weakness does more damage.

trait.description: Increases the grace period of your crowd control effects.

trait.name: Trick: Enrage
trait.description: Earns Trick: Enrage.

trait.name: Opportunist
trait.description: The skill Subtle Stab does additional damage to targets with an active Trick on them. Additional ranks increase the damage dealt.

trait.description: The skill Burglar's Antidote now applies to the Fellowship.

trait.name: Double Down
trait.description: Diversion has a chance to apply a gamble. Provoke has a chance to apply a Daze. Provoke's chance is increased when applied from Stealth.

trait.name: All In
trait.description: Earns the skill: All In.

trait.description: Improves the Heal over Time from Bob and Weave.

trait.description: Earns the skill: Revealing Mark.

trait.name: Upshot

trait.name: Rain of Arrows
trait.description: Earns the skill: Rain of Arrows.

Earns the skill: Concession and Rebuttal.

Places 5 Charges that can be consumed to enhance the Rune-keepers Lightning skills.

Using one of these Enhanced skills consumes a Charge.

trait.description: Increases the number of targets Vivid Imagery affects.

trait.name: Playing with Fire
trait.description: Adds unique debuffs when using a Fire, Frost, or Lightning skill on a target afflicted with Fire-lore:

trait.name: Ancient Craft
trait.description:
Increases Armour Debuff of Ancient Craft

 At third rank, Ancient Craft causes the first Lightning Skill to be used against a target to deal bonus damage.

At max rank, your armour is 5% more effective.

trait.name: Mending Lore
trait.description: Increases Outgoing Healing per Rank. At max rank, increases the Incoming Healing buff on Water-lore.

trait.name: Poignant Phrases

trait.name: Cacophonous Timeless Echoes

trait.name: The Fundamentals

trait.description: Increases max Morale.

trait.description: Increases the potency of Heals.

trait.description: Earns the skill: Cry of the Wizards.

trait.name: Sharing a Story
trait.description: A Critical hit with a Ballad will reset Piercing Cry cooldowns.

trait.name: Inspiring Cries and Calls
trait.description: Healing skills have a chance to reset the cooldown of Cries and Calls. You cannot gain this effect more than once every 15s.

trait.name: Improved Bolster Courage
trait.description: Bolster Courage delivers a more potent heal.

trait.name: Triumphant Spirit
trait.description: Earns the skill: Triumphant Spirit.

trait.name: Call of Oromë
trait.description: Earns the skill: Call of Oromë.

trait.name: Shielding Cry
trait.description: Piercing Cry causes some of the damage the Fellowship takes to be reflected upon your enemies.

trait.name: Cry of the Valar
trait.description: Earns the skill: Cry of the Valar.

trait.name: Shield Focus
trait.description: Gain a defensive skill.

trait.name: Critical Strikes
trait.description: Increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage.

trait.name: Herald's Strength
trait.description: Dissonant Strike steals Morale from the enemy on a Critical Hit.

trait.name: Discordant Cries
trait.description: Increases the damage of Cries and Calls.

trait.name: Improved Coda of Resonance
trait.description: Coda of Resonance briefly reduces incoming damage.

trait.name: Quick Melody
trait.description: Lowers skill induction time, letting you heal faster.

trait.name: Anthem of Composure
trait.description: Earns the skill: Anthem of Composure.

trait.name: Strong Appeal
trait.description: Increases the Crit chance of heals.

trait.name: Strength of Helm Hammerhand
trait.description: Adds a Physical and Tactical Mastery buff to Song of the Hammerhand's and Gift of the Hammerhand's bubble.

trait.name: Extended Anthems
trait.description: Increases Anthem Duration

trait.name: Thrill of Danger
trait.description: Earns the skill: Thrill of Danger.

trait.name: Haemorrhage
trait.description: The Brutal Assault skill has a chance to apply a Haemorrhaging Wound. Each rank will increase the wound's damage over time.

trait.name: Tireless Defender
trait.description: Your Guardian's Ward skill will reduce skill power cost while active.

trait.name: War-chant
trait.description: Earns the skill: War-chant.

trait.name: Disorientation
trait.description: The skills Shield-smash and Shield-blow make it harder for your enemy to avoid attacks.

trait.name: Relentless Assault
trait.description: The Sting skill has a chance to provide a block and parry response.

trait.name: Bring on the Pain
trait.description: For a short period of time, your Thrill of Danger skill will allow you to restore a small amount of morale every time you are hit.

trait.name: Bolster
trait.description: Blocking attacks will increase your Critical Defence Rating. This effect may stack up to five times.

trait.name: Redirect
trait.description: Earns the skill: Redirect.

trait.name: Warrior's Fortitude
trait.description: The Warrior's Heart skill will also increase your Physical Mastery rating, Incoming Healing, Evade chance, and Partial Evade chance.

trait.name: Warrior's Fortitude
trait.description: The skill Warrior's Heart will also increase your Physical Mitigation, Incoming Healing, and Block chance.

trait.name: Broad Strokes
trait.description: Sweeping Cut will affect additional targets and has a chance to apply a Bleed on hit.

trait.name: Guardian's Pledge
trait.description: Earns the skill: Guardian's Pledge.

trait.name: Blind Rage
trait.description: The To The King skill has a chance to trigger a Parry response.

trait.name: Reversal
trait.description: The Turn the Tables skill has a reduced cooldown, and will provide brief combat state immunity when used.

trait.name: Tireless Blows
trait.description: Parry responses have a chance to reset the cooldown of Brutal Assault.

trait.name: Defensive Expertise
trait.description: Increases your Block and Partial Block Rating.

trait.name: Thrust
trait.description: Earns the skill: Thrust.

trait.name: Shield-smash
trait.description: Earns the skill: Shield-smash.

trait.name: Skilled Deflection
trait.description: Increases your Parry/Partial Parry Rating

trait.name: Bellow
trait.description: Increases the range of your Challenge and Fray the Edge skills.

trait.name: Heavy Weapons Training
trait.description: Increases damage with each of your skills.

trait.name: Tenderize
trait.description: Parrying attacks will increase your Critical Rating. This effect may stack up to five times and will expire out of combat.

trait.name: Brutal Assault
trait.description: Earns the skill: Brutal Assault.

trait.name: Warrior's Fortitude
trait.description: The Warrior's Heart skill will also increase your Physical Mastery rating, Melee Crit chance, Parry chance, and Partial Parry chance.

trait.name: To The King
trait.description: Earns the skill: To the King.

trait.name: Juggernaut
trait.description: Earns the skill: Juggernaut.

trait.name: Vicious Rebuttal
trait.description: The Redirect skill will absorb and reflect additional damage.

trait.name: Improved Shield Spikes
trait.description: Increases the duration and Crit chance of shield spikes.

trait.name: Deeper Wounds
trait.description: Increase the damage and duration of Deep Wound and Terrible Wounds.

trait.name: Hammer Down
trait.description: Earns the skill: Hammer Down.

trait.name: Cataclysmic Shout
trait.description: Earns the skill: Cataclysmic Shout.

trait.name: High-spirited
trait.description: Increases Incoming Healing.

trait.name: To The Rescue
trait.description: The Charge skill will provide additional run speed for a longer period of time.

trait.name: Demoralizing Anthem
trait.description: Increases the range and number of targets affected by your War-chant skill. If you are currently protecting an ally, War-chant will also reduce the cooldown of your Block/Parry Response skills.

trait.name: Of All Trades
trait.description: Increase damage and healing.

trait.name: Martial Fury
trait.description: Gambits in the Power Attack Gambit line and the Precise Blow Gambit line have 15% chance to apply a secondary DoT to their target which stacks with the normal DoT.\n\nSecondary DoTs cannot stack with each other.

trait.name: Taking Advantage
trait.description: After Parrying or Partially Parrying, you heal a small amount of Morale and your Gambit Builders cost no Power for 5s.

trait.name: One After Another
trait.description: Minor victories in battle hearten you.

trait.name: Shield Tactics
trait.description: Clever use of the shield greatly increases your Tactical Mitigation.

trait.name: Shield Mastery
trait.description: Grants access to Shield Mastery, a skill which enhances your avoidances.

trait.name: Exultation of Battle
trait.description: Your Morale-taps last longer.

trait.name: Endurance Training
trait.description: Exercising your throwing arm prevents you from wearing out during battle.

trait.name: Makeshift Caltrops
trait.description: Improved Hampering Javelin now slows enemies around your target.

trait.name: Focus Fire
trait.description: You excel at marking priority targets for your fellows.

trait.name: Throwing Arm
trait.description: A strong throwing arm puts more power behind your Javelins.

trait.name: Elegant Finish
trait.description: You gain a swath of unique bonuses to your Buff chain finishers.

trait.name: Manifested Ire
trait.description: Enemies are snared if they fail to continue attacking the Guardian after their use of damaging abilites.

trait.name: Incapacitation
trait.description: The potency of all non-damaging debuffs is increased by 100% on your marked target.

trait.name: Adaptability
trait.description: Whenever you are hit by an attack, your block and parry ratings will increase.\n\nThis effect can stack up to 3 times and will last for 10s or until a response skill is used.

trait.name: Mark of Permanence
trait.description: Non-damaging debuffs applied to a target marked by Take to Heart become permanent in duration.

trait.name: Light-touched
trait.description: This trait enhances your melee damage, and incoming healing.\n\nYou will also be able to block with 2-handed weapons.

trait.name: Valorous Strength
trait.description: This trait enhances your melee and critical damage.

trait.name: Guardian's Defence
trait.description: This trait enhances your armour, critical defence, block chance and mitigation, and reduces shield wear while blocking

trait.name: Heavy Blows
trait.description: This trait further increases your melee damage and critical damage multiplier.

trait.name: Disabling Strikes
trait.description: The potency of all non-damaging debuffs is increased by 50%

trait.name: Bolstering Blocks
trait.description: Blocking attacks will restore a small amount of morale.

trait.name: Prey on the Weak
trait.description: Critical hits against an opponent suffering from a Slashing Wound will inflict additional damage.

trait.name: Shield the People
trait.description: Your shield skills are twice as likely to provide you with a Fortification buff. At five stacks, you will provide a fellowship-wide mitigation buff.

trait.name: Reactive Parry
trait.description: Parrying attacks will cause a small amount of damage to your enemies.

trait.name: Protection
trait.description: You may protect one of your allies, improving his defence. You will also be able to react to attacks made against him if you are within 10m.

trait.name: Protection by the Sword
trait.description: You may enhance your fellowship members, improving their physical mastery and parry. You will also be able to react to attacks that an ally parries if you are within 10m.

trait.name: Shield Wall
trait.description: Protects an ally by intercepting all incoming damage.

trait.name: Readied Blade
trait.description: Shadow's Lament triggers a Battle-ready Event.

trait.name: Inspiriting Presence
trait.description: Critical heals with Inspire and Valiant Strike grant you and your Song-brother guaranteed Critical Hits with Tactical skills for the next 10s.\n\nInspire's healing is enhanced based on the tier of your Gallant Display buff. When Inspire is used, the Gallant Display buff will be consumed.

trait.name: Elendil's Favour
trait.description: Blade of Elendil makes your next Valiant Strike heal for more.

trait.name: Blessing of the Song
trait.description: You gain the benefits of your Song-brother skills.

trait.name: Blade-brother's Call
trait.description: Unlocks the Blade-brother's Call skill.

trait.name: Uplift
trait.description: Critical Heals give the Captain a stacking Critical Hit buff.

trait.name: Defensive Strike
trait.description: Sure Strike grants an Armour buff, and you Parry attacks more often.

trait.name: Elendil's Boon
trait.description: Blade of Elendil causes the next attack against you to deal less damage.

trait.name: Blessing of the Blade
trait.description: You gain the benefits of your Blade-brother skills.

trait.name: Exemplar
trait.description: When you or your Shield-brother is attacked, both have a chance to be healed.\n\nCritical and Devastating Hits against you or your Shield-brother reduce the cooldown of Shield of the Dúnedain and Strength in Numbers.

trait.name: Song-brother's Call
trait.description: Unlocks the Song-brother's Call skill.

trait.name: Last Stand
trait.description: Unlocks the Last Stand skill.

trait.name: Blessing of the Shield
trait.description: You gain the benefits of your Shield-brother skills.

trait.name: Tactician's Prowess
trait.description: Increases Critical Healing Magnitude.

trait.name: Master of War
trait.description: Critical Hits with Inspire and Shadow's Lament cause you and your Blade-brother's next Melee or Ranged Skill to Crit.\n\nBanner of War causes a stacking Critical Rating buff to allies within its effect for each skillplay they perform.

trait.name: Two-handed Prowess
trait.description: You may Block with a two-handed weapon and have more Morale.

trait.name: Lacerate
trait.description: Grave Wound spreads a Bleed to targets around the Captain when used on a target with the Cutting Attack bleed.

trait.name: Shield-brother's Call
trait.description: Unlocks the Shield-brother's Call skill.

trait.name: Cutting Edge
trait.description: Cutting Attack causes you to deal additional critical damage for a short time.

trait.name: Elendil's Fortune
trait.description: Blade of Elendil causes your next Shadow's Lament to deal additional damage.

trait.name: Readied Strike
trait.description: Valiant Strike triggers a Battle-ready event.

trait.name: Bracing Against Defeat
trait.description: Bracing Attack now generates 2 points of fervour and the amount of Morale it restores is increased.

trait.name: Sharpened Blades
trait.description: Increases the initial damage of rend and increases the max number of stacks of its bleed to five

trait.name: Precise Strikes
trait.description: Hits with any strike skill decreases the Champion's attack duration. In addition, critical strikes generate an additional point of fervour. These effects have a chance to be triggered per hit of a skill.

trait.name: Glory
trait.description: Reduce incoming melee damage.

trait.name: Ardour
trait.description: Reduces Power Cost per Fervour point.

trait.name: Red Haze
trait.description: Killing an enemy restores full Fervour.

trait.name: Renewing Strikes
trait.description: Strike Skills have a chance to return a percentage of max Morale. This effect has a chance to be triggered per hit of a skill.

trait.name: Masochism Increase
trait.description: Increases the chance of Masochism's effects to apply by 10% and increases the amount of damage it reflects by 20%.

trait.name: Fervour
trait.description: Increases Power regeneration and Damage Dealt per fervour pip.

trait.name: Exalted Combatant
trait.description: Heals the Champion if their Morale gets low.

trait.name: Good Defence/Strong Offence
trait.description: Deal more melee damage whilst Sudden Defence is active.

trait.name: Furious Swings
trait.description: Increases the damage of all Blade skills and gives them a chance to generate an additional point of fervour.

trait.name: Ardour Increase
trait.description: Increases damage and gives a Tactical Mitigation rating for each Fervour point.

trait.name: Flurry Increase
trait.description: Increases the duration of Flurry and grants critical rating

trait.name: Emboldened Blades Increase
trait.description: Increases the Critical Damage of Remorseless Strike by 10% per stack.

trait.name: Exchange of Blows
trait.description: Reflects a portion of damage taken for a moderate duration

trait.name: Devastation
trait.description: Devastating Strike bypasses a portion of its target's mitigations.

trait.name: Adamant
trait.description: Reduces incoming damage for a short duration. The amount of damage reduced is dependant on how many pips of fervour is consumed

trait.name: Invincible
trait.description: For each 5% of health the Champion is missing, his damage is increased while Adamant is active.

trait.name: Born For Combat
trait.description: Each time you are struck by an enemy, you gain a stack of Born for Combat. At 10 stacks, you gain a powerful AoE skill that damages foes all around you.

trait.name: Fire at Will
trait.description: You call for your fellowship to rain attacks down upon your enemies, granting them bonuses to their damage.

trait.name: A Small Snag
trait.description: Sometimes we just get caught up on the little things in life. You make sure this tends to happen more often than not.

trait.name: Frost Affinity
trait.description: Grants bonus healing.

trait.name: Writ of Well-being
trait.description: Writ of Health now tiers down instead of dispelling upon expiration.

trait.name: Glorious Foreshadowing
trait.description: Incoming healing is increased by 5% for each Writ of Health tier on a target.

trait.name: Fire Affinity
trait.description: Grants bonus Fire damage.

trait.name: Sustenance
trait.description: Sustaining Bolt also heals Morale, its potency based on Battle attunement.

trait.name: Fellowship Narrative
trait.description: Healing attunement increases the Critical chance of healing abilities and effects. Also increases the healing of Epic For The Ages.

trait.name: Writ of Blazing Fire
trait.description: Writ of Fire now tiers down instead of dispelling upon expiration.

trait.name: Our Fates Entwined
trait.description: Grants a Runestone that can be placed at range, redirecting damage to itself for a moderate duration.

trait.name: Tale of The Storm
trait.description: Grants bonus Critical Chance and Critical Damage per Battle attunement.

trait.name: Scathing Retort
trait.description: Reduces the cooldown of Smouldering Wrath and makes the skill immune to interrupt.

trait.name: Master of Allusion
trait.description: Benediction of Peace: Crits reduce the induction time of the Rune-keeper's healing and frost skills for a short duration.

trait.name: Master of Tragedy
trait.description: Lightning skills critical hits restore a portion of the Rune-keeper's max power.

trait.name: Static Surge
trait.description: Lightning skills have a chance to grant a skill that deal lightning damage to enemies in front of you.

trait.name: Master of Connotation
trait.description: Fire skills place a stacking Master of Connotation buff on the Rune-keeper.\n\nAt five stacks, their next Writ heals Morale and has no induction.

trait.name: Lightning Affinity
trait.description: Grants bonus lightning damage.

trait.name: Extreme Heat
trait.description: Searing Words: damage is increased by 10% for each current tier of Writ of Fire on the target.

trait.name: Seething Truth
trait.description: Grants various bonuses to Fire Skills.

trait.name: Strong Intimidation
trait.description: Increases Hunter's Fear duration and reduces the chance of their Fear being resisted.

trait.name: Swift Release
trait.description: Reduces the inductions of Barbed Arrow and Swift Bow.

trait.name: Triple Trap
trait.description: Set Trap becomes Triple Trap, placing three traps instead of one.

trait.name: Master Trapper
trait.description:
Adds effects to your traps:

Triple Trap: +15% incoming damage debuff.

Piercing Trap: Restores morale to all those who hit the target.

Deadly Decoy: +10% incoming critical chance debuff.

trait.name: Sturdy Traps
trait.description: Increases the grace period of your traps and removes any focus loss from movement.

trait.name: Shoot to Kill
trait.description: Increases Ranged Damage.

trait.name: Nock on The Move
trait.description: Reduces the induction movement penalty.

trait.name: Deadly Decoy
trait.description: Decoy becomes Deadly Decoy, which now explodes after a duration, causing damage and stunning enemies around it.

trait.name: Improved Fleetness
trait.description: Fleetness now restores Focus in addition to granting a Speed buff.

trait.name: Hidden Stalker
trait.description: Greatly increases the Stealth level of Camouflage and increases Ranged Critical Chance while camouflaged.

trait.name: Archer's Mark
trait.description: Attacks have a chance to apply a stacking Critical Defence Debuff on enemies.

trait.name: Fleetness
trait.description: All harmful skills have a chance to apply an effect that increases your Movement Speed.

trait.name: Marksman
trait.description: Heart Seeker and Upshot's cooldowns are reduced by a certain amount for every Critical and Devastating hit.

trait.name: Intensified Fire
trait.description: Every attack made while Rapid Fire is active puts a stacking Physical Mastery buff on the Hunter.

trait.name: Barbed Hinderance
trait.description: Increases Barbed Arrow's damage and Slow potency.

trait.name: Haemorrhaging Shot
trait.description: Increases the Critical Damage of all Bow Attacks.

trait.name: Swift Mercy
trait.description: Increases the target health threshold of Merciful Shot and makes Swift Bow reduce the Focus cost of Merciful Shot per use.

trait.name: Hunter's Voice
trait.description: Reduces the cooldown of Cry of the Hunter, and increases its movement bonus by +10%

trait.name: Earthborn
trait.description: In addition to Power, Strength of the Earth now restores Morale and Focus.

trait.name: Purge Poison
trait.description: Purge Poison now cures your entire Fellowship.

trait.name: Heightened Senses
trait.description: Increases the Hunter's Stealth Detection and Evasion. In addition, when the Hunter evades an attack, it will reduce the active cooldown of all Trap skills.

trait.name: Continuous Blood Rage
trait.description:
Blood Rage becomes Continuous Blood Rage.

In addition to breaking the Champion out of all combat states, it provides immunity to combat states, reduces power costs, and increases resistances on the Champion for a moderate duration.

This skill also restores max fervour.

trait.name: Critical Coordination
trait.description: When your Pet scores a Critical Hit, your next skill is guaranteed to Crit as well.

trait.name: Liquid Fire
trait.description: Sticky Gourd becomes Improved Sticky Gourd, and applies Burning Embers to targets stuck in its area of effect every 4 seconds.

trait.name: Raven's Protection
trait.description: The Raven now offers a Tactical Mitigation Buff to you and your fellows.

trait.name: Force of Will
trait.description: Your mastery of Lore makes your debuffs last longer.

trait.name: Peerless Wisdom
trait.description: You have a greater chance of reflecting damage when using Wisdom of the Council.

trait.name: Advanced Knowledge of Cures
trait.description: Knowledge of Cures is now instant-cast.

trait.name: Stamp Out the Fire
trait.description: Your pets deal bonus damage to enemies suffering from Burning Embers.

trait.name: Flame of Anor
trait.description: Sign of Battle: Wizard's Fire now affects up to 2 additional targets.

trait.name: Beacon of Hope
trait.description: Light of Hope becomes Beacon of Hope, which heals allies in an area around your target.

trait.name: Fellowship Friend
trait.description: When your Pet scores a Critical Hit, a unique buff will be bestowed from your pet unto your fellowship.

trait.name: Ents go to War
trait.description: Grants you Ents go to War

trait.name: Air-lore
trait.description: You learn to use Air-lore

trait.name: Warding Lore
trait.description: You learn to use Warding Knowledge

trait.name: Herb-lore
trait.description: You learn to use Herb Lore

trait.name: Power of Knowledge
trait.description: Increases the Power restoration and damage from Power of Knowledge.

trait.name: Chill Wind
trait.description: Using Wind-lore on an enemy afflicted by Frost-lore will spread the cold to nearby foes.

trait.name: Wild Fire
trait.description: Using Wind-lore on an enemy afflicted by Fire-lore will spread the flames to nearby foes.

trait.name: Haste
trait.description: Ballads reduce the active cooldown of your Cries and Calls by 1s.

trait.name: Freedom
trait.description: Calls have a chance to trigger the ability to use a single healing skill from another stance.

trait.name: Fierce Cries
trait.description: Your Cry and Call damage is increased.

trait.name: Encore
trait.description: There is a small chance that a Coda will not consume your Ballads.

trait.name: Concentration
trait.description: You gain immunity to interruption and induction setback for 5 seconds after scoring a Critical Hit with a Cry or Call.

trait.name: Discordant Ballads
trait.description: All Ballads now grant you a Tactical Damage Buff.

trait.name: Improved Anthem of the Third Age
trait.description: Increases the bonuses offered by Anthem of the Third Age - Melody

trait.name: Improved Call of the Second Age
trait.description: Call of the Second Age offers improved bonuses.

trait.name: Tale of Tales
trait.description: Grants access to Tale of Tales, a powerful Aura which carries different buffs based on what stance you are in.

trait.name: Song of Restoration
trait.description: Story of Courage is now a targeted skill, and will remove an additional Poison, Disease, Wound, or Fear in an area around your target.

trait.name: Ascendant Anthem of the Third Age
trait.description: Further increases the bonuses offered by Anthem of the Third Age - Melody

trait.name: Resonant Ballads
trait.description: All Ballads increase Outgoing Healing by an extra 3%.

trait.name: Rally!
trait.description: The ways of the elder ages are not lost to all races yet. You may bring new inspiration to those whose Morale has been entirely depleted, reviving a defeated ally in combat.

trait.name: Resolute
trait.description: Protect yourself so that you may protect others.

trait.name: Bolster Our Courage
trait.description: A portion of Bolster Courage's heal is also applied to nearby Fellows.

trait.name: Song of Aid
trait.description: Grants access to Song of Aid, which gives each member of your fellowship a unique buff based on their class.

trait.name: Bleed Them Dry
trait.description: All Guardian bleeds have an extended duration.

trait.name: Call to Ioreth
trait.description: Grants access to Call to Ioreth, which causes your next heal to be a critical heal.

trait.name: Smashing Stab
trait.description: Earns the skill: Smashing Stab.

trait.name: Follow Through
trait.description: The Shield-smash skill will hit additional targets.

trait.name: Stoic
trait.description: Your Warrior's Heart skill has a chance to apply a damage bubble on use.\n\nAt rank 6 the bubble's potency is increased, and it can apply a 10% morale heal upon expiration.

trait.name: Guardian's Ward: Tactics
trait.description: Guardian's Ward will now provide additional Tactical Mitigation with each rank.

trait.name: Challenge the Darkness
trait.description: Your Challenge skill will affect additional targets and cast Guardian's Ward when used.

trait.name: Strengthen the Bulwark
trait.description: Your fortification buff will provide additional damage mitigation per stack.\n\nYour critical hits with shield skills will also automatically apply a stack of fortification.

trait.name: Rousing Words
trait.description: A channelled skill that heals Morale with every second.

trait.name: Essay of Fire
trait.description: Powerful damage over time skill that removes the induction of your next fire attack.

trait.name: Shocked
trait.description: Writ of Lightning also increases enemy inductions and attack duration.

trait.name: Strong Bursts
trait.description: Increases area of effect skill damage.

trait.name: Numbed Senses
trait.description: Ignore the Pain will remove additional debuffs.

trait.name: Radiate
trait.description: Your damaging area of effect skills have a chance to transfer your debuffs to additional targets.

trait.name: Lesser Giant Eagle
trait.description: Earns the skill: Eagle-friend.

trait.name: Insult to Injury
trait.description: Your damaging attacks have a chance to renew all debuffs on your target.

trait.name: Flash of Light
trait.description: Attacks against marked targets will deal Light damage to nearby targets.

trait.name: Overwhelming Odds
trait.description: Completing a Fellowship Manoeuvre will empower the burglar, based on what Manoeuvre was completed.

trait.name: Disabling Attack
trait.description: You are able to use your Disable skill to greatly reduce your enemy's speed.

trait.name: Little Annoyances
trait.description: You know how to make those little things really distract people. Small Snag becomes Quite a Snag, which has increased range, a more potent debuff, and no longer requires Double-edged Strike to be used first.

trait.name: Improved Sneak
trait.description: When using Surprise Strike or Cunning Attack from Sneak they are now guaranteed to be Critical Hits.\n\n<rgb=#DD2121>Note: This does not affect Feint Attack or Improved Feint Attack.</rgb>

trait.name: Practiced Bluff
trait.description: Your ability to bluff an attack through has been well-practiced. Feint Attack becomes Improved Feint Attack and now activates more stealth skills. Your damage from Stealth attacks, including Improved Feint, is also increased.

trait.name: Dealings Done
trait.description: You know what to do with the cards you are dealt. Lucky Strike becomes Gambler's Strike, which has a reduced cooldown, no longer requires Double-edged Strike, and can now upgrade Gambles to their max tier. Your chance of applying a gamble is also increased.

trait.name: Raise Our Spirits
trait.description: Raise the Spirit provides a fellowship-wide AoE heal.

trait.name: Emboldening Finish
trait.description: Ballads have a chance to build a stacking enhancement for Coda of Dissonance.\n\nEach stack will cause Coda of Dissonance to add a +3% damage buff, up to 15%.

trait.name: Inspiring Finish
trait.description: Ballads have a chance to build a stacking enhancement for Coda of Resonance.\n\nEach stack will cause Coda of Resonance to add 3% Outgoing Healing, up to 15%.

trait.name: Snap Shot
trait.description: Gambit Builders have a chance of triggering the ability to use one of your Javelin Skills, even if it is on cooldown. You cannot gain this effect more than once every 20s.

trait.name: Dodge This!
trait.description: When an enemy avoids an attack, you gain access to an unavoidable Javelin skill.

trait.name: Snowball
trait.description: Healing skills build a stacking buff. At maximum stack, you can use a powerful heal

trait.name: Purify Corruption
trait.description: Your Strike skills and Echoes of Battle skills will remove a corruption effect from a foe.

trait.name: Friend of Ravens
trait.description: You may summon a raven to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Sabre-cats
trait.description: You may summon a Sabre-tooth to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Nature
trait.description: You may summon a Spirit of Nature to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Lynx
trait.description: You may summon a lynx to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Bog-guardians
trait.description: You may summon a Bog-guardian to your side.

trait.name: Friend of Bears
trait.description: You may summon a bear to your side.

trait.name: Brutal Strikes
trait.description: Earns the skill: Brutal Strikes.

trait.name: Blade Damage
trait.description: Increases Blade skill damage.

trait.name: Broad Sweep
trait.description: Increases the number of Targets for Area Effect Skills\n\n At max rank, Swift Strike becomes Swift Blade.

trait.name: Concussive Shout
trait.description: Critical Hits with Piercing Cry will stun the target for 5s.

trait.name: Heart Seeker
trait.description: First rank unlocks the Skill Heart Seeker. Second rank increases the duration of the Heartseeker DoT.

trait.name: Swift and True
trait.description: Increases Swift Bow's damage per rank. Max rank gives Quick Shot a chance to reduce the induction of Swift Bow.

trait.name: Perseverance
trait.description: Increases the Power and Morale gain of Press Onward.

trait.name: Press Onward
trait.description: Earns the skill: Press Onward.

trait.name: Tripwire
trait.description: Earns the skill: Tripwire.

trait.name: Word Spreads
trait.description: Each rank increases the amount of maximum targets for Gift of the Hammerhand by 1.

trait.name: Perfect Performance
trait.description: Your ballads provide a portion of their bonuses to your fellowship.

trait.name: Enough for Everyone
trait.description: Grants the Skill: Share the Power - Fellowship

trait.name: Rapid Fire
trait.description: Reduces Induction Duration

trait.name: Valour
trait.description: The Captain's healing skills have a 20% chance to build stacks of valour. At 5 stacks, you burst an AoE heal around yourself and your next Valiant Strike is guaranteed to crit.

trait.name: Elite Companions
trait.description: You give your companions the equipment and training to damage enemy armour.

trait.name: Elendil's Fury
trait.description: Blocking, Parrying, and Evading attacks build stacks of Elendil's Fury. At 5 stacks, you channel this Fury into your next Blade of Elendil for additional damage and grant yourself a defeat event.

trait.name: Bleed Damage
trait.description: Slash now applies a bleed that can stack up to three times. Additional ranks increase the potency of the bleed.

trait.name: Serrated Edge
trait.description: Biting Edge becomes a single attack, but as a bleed over 12 seconds. \n \n Max Rank reduces the duration of the bleed in half.

trait.name: Quick Recovery
trait.description: Increases the initial heal of Recuperate at the cost of lowering the heal-over-time. The second rank increases the initial heal further.

trait.name: Piercing Roar
trait.description: Unlocks Piercing Roar, a single target attack that reduces your target's damage.

trait.name: Levelling Roar
trait.description: Takedown no longer deals damage, but can now be used on targets up to 10m away.

trait.name: Encouraging Strike
trait.description: Striking enemies with Slash puts a stacking healing buff on yourself. Additional ranks increase the potency of the buff per stack.

trait.name: Crippling Stings
trait.description: Bee Swarm now also snares your enemies for a short duration. Additional ranks increase the potency of the snare.

trait.name: Final Strike
trait.description: Increases the damage and health threshold requirement of Execute.

trait.name: Composure
trait.description: Hearten becomes Composure, a self only heal that heals the Beorning for a percentage of his or her Max Morale per tick.

trait.name: Imposing Presence
trait.description: Increases Grisly Cry's fear duration per rank

trait.name: In Harm's Way
trait.description: In addition to redirecting damage to the Beorning, Sacrifice also transfers some of the target's threat.

trait.name: Nature's Mend
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Nature's Mend, an induction based heal that is more potent for your marked ally.

trait.name: Stampede
trait.description: Using Rush in Bear Form applies the effect to your entire fellowship. Additional ranks increase the duration of the effect.

trait.name: Execute
trait.description: Unlocks Execute, a heavy hitting skill that costs Wrath.

trait.name: Improved Hearten
trait.description: Increases Hearten's heal per rank.

trait.name: Physical Mitigation Increase
trait.description: Increases your Physical Mitigation per rank.

trait.name: Fate
trait.description: Increases your Fate per rank.

trait.name: Melee Damage
trait.description: Increases your melee damage per rank.

trait.name: Weakening Blow
trait.description: Increases the damage of Slam per rank. Max Rank gives Slam an outgoing damage debuff.

trait.name: Lumber
trait.description: After using Rush in bear form, your next attack will knock down your target.

trait.name: Takedown
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Takedown, a bear form attack that deals minor damage and knocks a target down.

trait.name: Vitality Increase
trait.description: Increases your vitality per rank.

trait.name: Any Advantage
trait.description: Striking an enemy from behind with Slam will heal you.

trait.name: Shake Free
trait.description:
The first rank adds a Morale Bubble to Shake Free. The second rank increases the potency of the bubble. 
 
 If Support: 
 Shake Free applies its benefits to your marked ally.

trait.name: Tactical Mitigation Increase
trait.description: Increases your Tactical Mitigation per rank.

trait.name: Enraging Sacrifice
trait.description: Reduces the amount of damage Sacrifice redirects from your ally. Gain Wrath every time your Sacrifice target is hit.

trait.name: Sluggish Stings
trait.description: In addition to dealing damage, your bees now increase the induction duration of your target.

trait.name: Healing Increase
trait.description: Increases your Outgoing Healing per rank.

trait.name: Assertive Roar
trait.description: Ferocious Roar gains a Max Morale buff. Additional ranks increase the potency of the buff.

trait.name: Opposing Presence
trait.description: Increases the Area Effect damage of Biting Edge. Max rank causes Biting Edge to force taunt for a short duration, but at the cost of an increased cooldown.

trait.name: Turn The Tides
trait.description: Nature's Vengeance now deals damage to the target for every corruption it removes. Additional ranks increase the amount of damage you do per corruption removed.

trait.name: Rending Blows
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Rending Blow.

trait.name: Recuperate
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Recuperate, a wrath consuming heal over time.

trait.name: All On The Line
trait.description: Increases the amount of damage that Sacrifice redirects, but mitigates a percentage of the redirected damage.

trait.name: Quick Mend
trait.description: Reduces the induction of Nature's Mend and increases its healing.

trait.name: Raging Blow
trait.description:
Increases the damage of Vicious Claws. 
 
 If Support: 
 Striking a target with Vicious Claws will give your Mark of Grimbeorn target a short duration damage buff. Additional ranks increase the potency of the buff.

trait.name: Desperate Shouts
trait.description: After using Ferocious Roar, the Wrath cost of your next healing skill is reduced. At max rank, the cost is fully removed.

trait.name: Hardened Heart
trait.description: After using Hearten, you generate additional Wrath over time. Amount per second is increased by additional ranks.

trait.name: Armour Crush
trait.description: The first rank converts Rending Blow into Armour Crush, which adds an incoming damage debuff to the skill. The second rank increases the debuff but increases the cooldown of the skill.

trait.name: Debilitating Bees
trait.description: Bee Swarm reduces the target's Physical Mitigation for its duration.

trait.name: Critical Chance
trait.description: Increases your Critical Chance per rank.

trait.name: Vigilant Roar
trait.description: Vigilant Roar gains a reactive shield that reflects a portion of the damage taken. Additional ranks increase the shield's duration.

trait.name: Moment of Opportunity
trait.description: Increases the damage of Execute per rank. Max rank gives the Beorning's attacks in bear form a chance to proc a free Execute.

trait.name: Feral
trait.description: You are inspired by your pet companion, and take on a few of its fighting characteristics.

trait.name: Crippling Roar
trait.description: Adds a snare to Piercing Roar. Additional ranks improve the snare's strength.

trait.name: Fire Shield
trait.description: Your Fire skills have a 25% chance to raise a protective shield around you, boosting your defences and reflecting Fire Damage at attackers.

trait.name: Enfeeble
trait.description: The debuff strength of the following skills are increased for the first 10s of their cast:

trait.name: Fellowship Protector
trait.description: Your fellows are a source of strength.

trait.name: Cover Your Tracks
trait.description: You learn to cover your tracks, making it harder for the enemy to retaliate for your mischief.

trait.name: Sharp Eye
trait.description: Learning to spot cheats has taught you to better spot enemy attacks. You are better able to better weather the enemy when not using your most potent abilities.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
trait.description: Deal savage damage when attacking from stealth.

trait.name: Quick with a Blade
trait.description: Your refined technique allows you to take better advantage of an enemy, regardless of their health.

trait.name: The More The Merrier
trait.description: You grow so adept at fighting groups of enemies you become more effective when doing so.

trait.name: Weapons Master
trait.description: Your extensive weapons training makes you a dangerous foe with your arms of choice.

trait.name: Moving Target
trait.description: A moving target is always more difficult to hit.

trait.name: Plant Feet
trait.description: You hold your ground even under enemy fire.

trait.name: Emergency Preparations
trait.description: You save a trap for when you are most threatened.

trait.name: Honed Spikes
trait.description: You can improve any set of shield-spikes you come across.

trait.name: Seize the Moment
trait.description: Your Critical Hits can open up the enemy to a barrage of attacks.

trait.name: Prolonged Verse
trait.description: Increases the number of pulses of Mending Verse. Max rank lowers the induction of Mending verse.

trait.name: Overture of Hope
trait.description: Rune-keeper bubbles increase a targets incoming healing and reduces the damage they take. Words of Exaltation will also trigger the expiration heal of Bombastic Inspiration on a target if it is present.

trait.name: Branded Marks
trait.description: Increases the pulses of all Fire damage over time effects.

trait.name: Hastened Determination
trait.description: Reduces the cooldown of self Motivation. At max rank, Self Motivation has no induction and can be used while moving.

trait.name: Flashing Images
trait.description: For a short duration after using Steady Hands to switch attunement, using a skill which returns you to neutral attunement will activate the Steady Hands effect again.

trait.name: Break Ranks
trait.description: Throw aside your defences to unleash punishment upon the enemy.

trait.name: Honourable Combat
trait.description: A fair exchange brings rest to both yourself and your foe.

trait.name: Singular Focus
trait.description: Your focus allows you to target weaknesses in enemy armour, hastening their defeat. Your marked enemies are especially vulnerable.

trait.name: Strike a Chord
trait.description: Your Ballads may be beautiful to you, but your foes would disagree.

trait.name: Inner Strength
trait.description: Your songs infuse inner strength in your allies.

trait.name: Echoes
trait.description: All damaging Cries and Calls can echo in your enemies' ears, dealing extra damage.

trait.name: Bond of Trust
trait.description: You always make time to tend to a trusted friend.

trait.name: Sharpened Claws
trait.description: Letting out a fierce war cry empowers you.

trait.name: Animalistic
trait.description: You prefer to spend your days as a bear over all else.

trait.name: Greater Swarm
trait.description: You draw on the powers of unexpected allies.

trait.name: Mark of Beorn
trait.description: Mark your enemies.

trait.name: Battle Born
trait.description: Throughout your life, you defended your land from countless Orc attacks, seasoning you as a warrior.

trait.name: Defensively Minded
trait.description: Your experience in the thick of battle has made you stronger.

trait.name: Festering Wounds
trait.description: Wounds you inflict upon your enemies take longer than usual to heal.

trait.name: Down But Not Out
trait.description: A Beorning's ability to fight through pain is legendary.

trait.name: Brutal Energy
trait.description: The faster you slay a foe, the quicker you can defeat the next.

trait.name: Menacing Assault
trait.description: You ferociously swing at your opponents, forcing them to pay attention.

trait.name: Worthy Adversary
trait.description: Some say a Beorning's hide is stronger than some shields.

trait.name: Honey Cleanse
trait.description: Beornings are keen to the medicinal properties of honey.

trait.name: Rake
trait.description: If they stop paying attention to you, they will pay for it.

trait.name: Rejuvenating Bellow
trait.description: A Beorning's roar can be as heartening to its allies as it is intimidating to its enemies.

trait.name: Flayer of Evil
trait.description: While your people in their bear form are known for their might, you appear larger and more formidable than most.

trait.name: Guarded Attack
trait.description: Offence leads to victories, but defence wins wars.

trait.name: Grimbeorn's Strength
trait.description: Inspired by Grimbeorn, you learn to better aid your friends in times of need.

trait.name: Wrathful
trait.description: Your wrath on the battlefield is that of legend.

trait.name: Aid the Assault
trait.description: Your relentless attack boosts the Morale of your allies.

trait.name: Raining Blows
trait.description: You grow in strength each time you strike your foe with your claws.

trait.name: Virtuous Beorning
trait.description: The Virtues of Beorn are represented strongly in you. This trait does not apply to unequipped or capped Virtues.

trait.name: Beorning Club and Axe-damage Bonus
trait.description: Beorning Club and Axe-damage Bonus

trait.name: Thick Hide
trait.description: Increased Vitality - Beornings are thick skinned.

trait.name: Natural Resistance
trait.description: Improved Poison Resistance - Their bond with the natural world gives Beornings a natural resistance to toxins.

trait.name: Might of the Wild
trait.description: Increased Might - Beornings wield a ferocity unmatched by other races.

trait.name: Few in Number
trait.description: Reduced Fate - So few in number, the Beornings' Fate is in question.

trait.name: Emissary
trait.description: You represent your people to the good folk of Middle-earth.

trait.name: Bake a Honey-cake
trait.description: You have mastered Beorn's recipe for Honey-cakes and can make them whenever you'd like.

trait.name: Might and Conviction Bonus
trait.description: You receive a bonus to Ent's Strength and Eagle's Cry contributions.

trait.name: Return to Grimbeorn's Lodge
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Grimbeorn's Lodge.

trait.name: Natural Diet
trait.description: Your unique diet gives you resistance to disease.

trait.name: Feral Presence
trait.description: You provide a bonus to your fellowship's Fate.

trait.name: Bracing Roar
trait.description: In their darkest moments, Beornings can muster a powerful roar which restores Morale and unleashes their Wrath.

trait.name: Nature's Bond
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Nature's Bond which allows you to mark an ally. When you receive healing, your marked ally also receives healing equal to 70% of the original heal.

trait.name: Thickened Hide
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Thickened Hide, which reduces all damage taken for a duration. During this time, the Beorning will heal for one percent of his or her Morale each time he or she is hit.

trait.name: Call To Wild
trait.description: Unlocks the skill Call to Wild, a buff that increases the Beorning's damage, causes pip generators to build faster, and bear form skills to cost less for a duration.

trait.name: Thrash Damage
trait.description: Increases the damage of Thrash per rank.

trait.name: Broad Thrash
trait.description: Thrash - Tier 3 now hits up to 5 enemies in front of the Beorning.

trait.name: Thunderous Roar
trait.description: Enhances Vigilant Roar to taunt all enemies within 10m of the Beorning

trait.name: In The Face Of
trait.description: Bear Up can now be used in combat but has an increased cooldown.

trait.name: Light in the Shadow
trait.description: Your ability to go unseen becomes more potent.

trait.name: Melee Skills Range
trait.description: Your reach with melee weapons is improved.

trait.name: Melee Skills Range
trait.description: Your reach with melee weapons is improved.

trait.name: Legendary
trait.description: You have ranged across the lands of Middle-earth, and have foiled the plans of the Enemy at every turn.

trait.name: Virtuous High Elf
trait.description: The Virtues of the High Elves are represented strongly in you. This trait does not apply to unequipped or capped Virtues.

trait.name: Grace of the Firstborn
trait.description: You move swiftly and effortlessly through the world.

trait.name: Blade Dancer
trait.description: Your bladework is as deadly as it is beautiful to behold.

trait.name: Enmity of Darkness
trait.description: Your very presence pushes back the shadow.

trait.name: Those Who Remain
trait.description: You resist the call to the west, knowing there is still work to be done in Middle-earth.

trait.name: Grace of Valinor
trait.description: The hope you carry from Valinor can revive the spirit of even the most desperate ally.

trait.name: Glory of the First Age
trait.description: This immobilizing technique you learned long ago has not lost its potency.

trait.name: Travel to Caras Galadhon
trait.description: This enables you to quickly return to Lothlórien.

trait.name: Wrath of the Firstborn
trait.description: Inspire your fellows to fight back against the shadow.

trait.name: Peace of the Eldar
trait.description: Increased Morale and Morale Regeneration - In times of peace, your vitality and spirit are renewed more swiftly than those of the younger races of the world.

trait.name: Fading of the Firstborn
trait.description: Reduced Fate - The time of the Elves in Middle-earth is nearly at its end.

trait.name: Suffer no Illness
trait.description: Improved resistance to Disease and Poison - Elves do not suffer illness.

trait.name: Sorrow of the Undying
trait.description: Reduced Will - You have witnessed the passing of Ages, and still feel the hurts of those lost in the battles of the Elder Days.

trait.name: Fiddle Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Fiddles.

trait.name: Hasten
trait.description: Your Staff Sweep skill will now reduce the cooldowns on Sticky Gourd (5s), Lightning Storm (10s), and Ents go to War (15s).

trait.name: Bolster
trait.description: A placeholder trait for the 'Bolster' ability.

trait.name: Bassoon Use
trait.description: Allows the use of Bassoons.

trait.name: Inner Light
trait.description: Your journeys have taught you to more effectively endure the shadow of Mordor.
